name: At Home Alone
description: This is a recreational healing Mini-plot game explored at home. Players will play and wander around the house from the perspective of a little girl. What will she do when she is alone? What strange stories will happen in the process, and in the process of exploration, you may find some strange secrets....
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Win 8 Win10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
